name: Stunning Castle in the Provençale Vineyards
description:
DESCRIPTION
A hotel and Chateau in the heart of Provençal vineyards. If you are looking to get married in Provence then look no further. This magnificent wedding venue in Provence could be your dream wedding location.
A magical stop in the heart of the vineyards
With several outstanding reception rooms including those with a magnificent view over the domain and the swimming pool. The Chateau offers luxury bedrooms with canopy beds, a spa, exceptional restaurant and much more... Come and enjoy a romantic, unforgettable stay in a cosy and elegant atmosphere.
The restaurant
A Provençale, local, inventive gastronomic cuisine.
Regional and seasonal products wonderfully accompanied by a wine from the region (more than 50 estates of Châteauneuf-du-pape are represented on our wine list including old vintages). Our restaurant staff will advice you on the best choice.
Special events
A fairytale castle
The Chateau is the ideal place to organise your events, receptions and weddings. Our hotel-restaurant can be completely privatised for your event.
A wedding in a castle
Treat yourself to a dream wedding : our castle is ideally situated and provides a unique setting to organise the happiest day of your life. The vicinity of Châteauneuf-du-Pape vineyards offer at the same time, a stylish and authentic atmosphere for your wedding reception and dinner.
Our big wedding hall can be set up to allow a dancing area. Our chef will present you with a menu that will meet your expectations and tailored to your needs.
Your custom-made events at the castle - Your dreams will come true
The big restaurant room will allow you to invite up to 150 persons. Cocktails and aperitives can be served on the panoramic terrace with an exceptional view. The broom, the lavender, the thyme fills the air with aromatic emanations
Private parties
An ideal place for an authentic party
The hostellerie offers a unique private setting to welcome all your events and private parties : birthdays, bachelorette parties, family and religious celebrations.
Hotel with charming rooms in Châteauneuf-du-Pape
The 11 rooms of the hotel all have a view on the vineyeard which surround the castle. Some rooms are facing south on the Alpilles moutains and Avignon Palais des papes, others, on the swimming pool, the Lubéron and some others on the Mont Ventoux.
Rooms and suites of our fairytale castle: Each room is different from the other. This unique look that inspires the rooms of the hotel is inspired by the castle, located in Châteauneuf-du-Pape, in the middle of the most prestigious vineyards of Côtes du Rhône, an exceptional place in Provence.
Private terrace, direct view on the estates, access to the panoramic private terrace by a spiral staircase from your room, bathrooms nestled in a turret... are among the characteristics and curiosities specific to each room of the Hostelleria that we invite you to discover.
Hotel services
Most of our rooms are equipped with a sofa bed and all of them have air conditioning, free wifi, a flat screen TV, a phone and minibar. The hotel is pleased to welcome you in a subtle and refined atmosphere during your stay in Provence.
There is also an opporunity for an ideal moment of relaxation with Balneotherapy and Sauna in our cocooning area.
Please get in touch for more information,
Many thanks.
